B. The entrance to the underground parking lot is currently in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
C. The entrance to the underground parking lot is not within my field of view.  
D. The entrance to the underground parking lot is currently on the left side of my field of view.  
E. The entrance to the underground parking lot is currently to the right of the center of my field of view.
